name: Pinballpoly
description:
Pronounced: Pin-ball-po-lee

Which games did you mashup? Pinball and Monopoly.

Which parts of the game did you create BEFORE the jam STARTED? None.

Which parts of the game did you NOT create?

  • Compass font by Kelvin Ma (https://www.dafont.com/compass.font)
  • Generated sounds with ChipTone (https://sfbgames.com/chiptone)
